item.title: Cloud Backup
item.description: I have a NAS at home, a Synology DS411J, which we use for backups, and to keep our family photos and videos. It works great, no complains here, but I am looking to keep an outside backup. A backup in the cloud, to be precise. The choices are: Amazon Drive Amazon AWS S3 Google Drive Apple iCloud DropBox Microsoft OneDrive Any other? I used to have Arqbackup, but it became unreliable, and I never liked the way it stored the files on AWS.
